Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, below shoulder on exterior part of male figure with three letters above head and other linear motifs to right, on rim line of black paint, inside rim a line of yellow paint with three black circles.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394050) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394050)
